title: The Curse of Von Dutch: A Brand to Die For
description:
Today on True Story, Tig and Cheryl discuss "The Curse of Von Dutch: A Brand to Die For", a true-crime Hulu docuseries about the flash-in-a-pan brand worn by everyone from Ashton Kutcher (friend of the pod) to Paris Hilton. Plus... murder?... although Tig and Cheryl struggle to remember the details, as always! *this episode spills beans* get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
